items.sentence: Do you think eating with your family is important?
Let\'s not do anything that might get us arrested.
What\'s your favorite kind of music to wake up to?
It\'ll be difficult to find a replacement for Tom.
I want to know what the cause of the accident was.
I want to stay here in Boston for a few more days.
I told Tom that I thought that it was a good idea.
I told Tom that his French was easy to understand.
I think you know that we have to help Tom do that.
Tom\'s parents usually speak French to each other.
How could something like this have gone unnoticed?
Tom and I were the ones who should\'ve left early.
Tom and I\'ve known each other since we were kids.
Who did Tom think would want to go there with him?
I don\'t have the confidence to do that by myself.
I don\'t know for certain what she is going to do.
How would you describe the kind of music you play?
How would you like to be our wedding photographer?
How would you like to work under those conditions?
Tom is wearing an expensive-looking pair of boots.
Tom plans to stay with us when he comes to Boston.
Tom poured a cup of coffee and offered it to Mary.
Tom probably has a good reason for not being here.
How could Tom and Mary even stay in the same room?
How could you get involved with a woman like that?
How could you take that job without consulting me?
How did we not know that this was going to happen?
I really want to be able to speak French fluently.
I suspect Tom and Mary went to Australia together.
You\'re not going to the picnic and that\'s final.
You\'re the only person I know who can\'t do that.
Tom is going to find out who did that, eventually.
Tom is going to have to deal with that on his own.
How did you convince Tom to wash your car for you?
How did you find out that Tom knew how to do that?
How did you persuade Tom to help you wash the car?
How do people celebrate the new year in Australia?
I\'m not sure anybody would be willing to help me.
I\'m not sure whether Tom can speak French or not.
Did you bring what you promised that you\'d bring?
You should\'ve accepted the money Tom offered you.
You\'d be surprised how well Tom can speak French.
I can\'t tell you how relieved that makes me feel.
Tom might want to consider asking Mary for advice.
Can you remember the first time you went swimming?
Tom said that he didn\'t want to sit next to Mary.
Tom and Mary just sat there staring at each other.
I think we should really consider Tom\'s proposal.
Tom normally doesn\'t show his feelings very much.
That should never ever be allowed to happen again.
If it\'s not raining, Tom usually walks to school.
I\'m kind of sleepy so I\'ll be heading back soon.
Tom said that he hoped to be back by October 20th.
Tom said that the mistake was due to an oversight.
When I entered Tom\'s room, he was reading a book.
Why don\'t we just do it now and get it over with?
I didn\'t realize you couldn\'t understand French.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly what he should be doing.
Why aren\'t you wearing those earrings I gave you?
Why didn\'t you let me know you were in Australia?
How much longer is Tom planning to live in Boston?
I don\'t think that there\'s anyone who hates Tom.
Do you have any idea what Tom was doing in Boston?
Mary has been wearing blue dresses a lot recently.
I\'ve got to stop Tom from doing something stupid.
I\'ve heard Tom is really good at speaking French.
I\'ve never been able to beat Tom at table tennis.
I don\'t think you could ever do that by yourself.
Tom decided to see if he could get into that club.
Every boy in the class wanted to sit next to Mary.
We\'re only asking you to help us for a few hours.
I don\'t know why Tom doesn\'t want to go with us.
Tom got into Mary\'s house through an open window.
Tom was supposed to leave for Australia on Monday.
I thought you said nobody here could speak French.
I told Tom that he should try to do it by himself.
Tom always goes back home to Boston for Christmas.
Where\'s the men\'s room? I want to wash my hands.
Tom and Mary promised me that they\'d wash my car.
You\'re the only person who did that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the tallest boy in our class, aren\'t you?
You\'re three years younger than Tom, aren\'t you?
The longer you wait, the worse it\'s going to get.
You should tell Tom that Mary is going to do that.
Tom told me that he didn\'t like living in Boston.
Tom watered the tree that he\'d just transplanted.
I think I wouldn\'t enjoy playing tennis with Tom.
Tom didn\'t expect to hear back from Mary so soon.
It doesn\'t look like you guys are having any fun.
What kind of things does Tom do that irritate you?
Tom wasn\'t in the mood to accept Mary\'s apology.
I thought you knew Tom was going to be here today.
Tom wanted Mary and John to go to Boston with him.
Tom wanted Mary to understand why he had to leave.
Tom says he\'ll be sticking around for a few days.
Would you go back to Boston if you had the chance?
Tom loves himself more than he loves anybody else.
It seems like Tom doesn\'t really want to do this.
Tom has been unemployed for the past three months.
Tom has had so many chances to do the right thing.
